defs.raw:
<radialGradient id="g_orb" cx="30%" cy="30%" r="70%">
        <stop offset="0%" stop-color="rgba(79,140,255,0.35)"/>
        <stop offset="55%" stop-color="rgba(79,140,255,0.12)"/>
        <stop offset="100%" stop-color="rgba(79,140,255,0)"/>
      </radialGradient>
      <radialGradient id="g_orb2" cx="30%" cy="30%" r="70%">
        <stop offset="0%" stop-color="rgba(139,91,255,0.30)"/>
        <stop offset="55%" stop-color="rgba(139,91,255,0.12)"/>
        <stop offset="100%" stop-color="rgba(139,91,255,0)"/>
      </radialGradient>
      <linearGradient id="g_accent" x1="0" y1="0" x2="1" y2="1">
        <stop offset="0%" stop-color="rgba(79,140,255,0.95)"/>
        <stop offset="100%" stop-color="rgba(139,91,255,0.95)"/>
      </linearGradient>
      <filter id="f_soft" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
        <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="14"/>
      </filter>
      <filter id="f_glow" x="-30%" y="-30%" width="160%" height="160%">
        <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="10" result="b"/>
        <feColorMatrix in="b" type="matrix" values="1 0 0 0 0.35  0 1 0 0 0.55  0 0 1 0 0.95  0 0 0 0.9 0" result="c"/>
        <feMerge>
          <feMergeNode in="c"/>
          <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic"/>
        </feMerge>
      </filter>
